PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object.

AttackDelay.description: How long this object waits before attacking the player.

MoveSpeed.description: How fast this object moves normally.

EscapeMoveSpeed.description: How fast this object moves when escaping.

DropTime.description: How long this enemy takes to drop bombs.

PathOffsetPosition.description: How far this object's position is offset from its path.

HasGravity.description: Whether this object is affected by gravity.

In3D.description: Whether this object is in a 3D section, or a 2D section.

DoesRespawn.description: Whether this object respawns after being destroyed.

DoesAttack.description: Whether this object attempts to attack the player.

Extra.value: Robotic falcons (Sonic Team can't spell) that bomb the shit out of you!
